name: Super Square Bros.
description:
Super Square Bros. is a platformer created for 32blit using SDL2. Currently only one level can be played, but more enemies and levels will be added very soon.

Be aware that clicking away from the game will result in it losing focus - if the game is not responding to keypresses, then make sure you're using the right keys (U and A/D), and try clicking on the GREY BORDER at the edge of the viewport to regain focus (not the actual game canvas). If all else fails, try reloading the page.

You can also download the exe or blit files below. The executable and blit files may have lower latency between keypresses and response than the web version.

The repository, with the code and the latest versions of all OS builds is at https://github.com/ThePythonator/Super-Square-Bros/releases/latest.

Controls (keyboard):

A/D - left/right

U - jump

Gamepad/controller is recommended, since the controls will correspond directly to the 32blit controls.

NOTE: Since this is made for 32blit, web and exe versions will have incorrect input prompts (for keyboard). E.g. 'Press A' actually means 'Press U':

Up/left/down/right = W/A/S/D

A/B/X/Y = U/I/O/P
